content:
FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/qa/run_schema_validation.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/qa/artifacts.py", "scripts/qa/docker_runner.py", "scripts/qa/failsafe_runner.py", "scripts/qa/qa_gate.py", "scripts/qa/run_schema_validation.py"]
SUMMARY: Wrote a CLI schema-validation script that validates pilot metadata JSONs against METADATA_SCHEMA.json, emits JSON+markdown outputs, and appends categorized failure modes to the pilot log.
